name: Little England
summary_text: One home, one secret, one man, two sisters. The 20 year old Orsa is madly in love with the lieutenant Spyros Maltabes. As a closed character she won't reveal her secret to anyone. Her ...                See full summary »

name: Ma mère
summary_text: When his father dies, a young man is introduced by his attractive, amoral mother to a world of hedonism and depravity.

name: Meet the Browns
summary_text: A single mom takes her family to Georgia for the funeral of her father -- a man she never met. There, her clan is introduced to the crass, fun-loving Brown family.

name: Crimes of Passion
summary_text: A mysterious woman, fashion designer by day and prostitute by night, is hounded by two men: a married father of two children and a sexually repressed preacher.

name: John Mulaney: Kid Gorgeous at Radio City
summary_text: John Mulaney relays his childhood and Saturday Night Live (1975), eviscerates the value of college, and laments getting older in this comedy special. Other topics include the church, his family, President Trump and pedophiles abducting kids.

name: Nothing in Common
summary_text: A highly successful advertising executive decides to put his job on hold after getting an update from his father that he and his wife are divorced and decides to extend his break after revealing that his father is a diabetic.

name: Ema
summary_text: A couple deals with the aftermath of an adoption that goes awry as their household falls apart.

name: Houseguest
summary_text: In hot water with the mob over an unpaid debt, a con man poses as a family friend in an affluent Pennsylvania suburb.

name: Undertow
summary_text: An unusual ghost story set on the Peruvian seaside; a married fisherman struggles to reconcile his devotion to his male lover within his town's rigid traditions.

name: National Velvet
summary_text: A jaded former jockey helps a young girl prepare a wild but gifted horse for England's Grand National Sweepstakes.

name: Slipp Jimmy fri
summary_text: Four stoners, five vegans, three mobsters, four hunters, and a million reasons to free one junkie elephant.

name: 102 Not Out
summary_text: 102 Not Out is a 2018 comedy-drama film, with legendary actor Amitabh Bachchan playing a 102-year-old wanting to break the oldest-man-alive record. Another Bollywood legend Rishi Kapoor plays his sad and grumpy 75-year-old son.

name: Aferim!
summary_text: Set in early 19th century Romania, a policeman, Costandin, is hired by a nobleman to find a Gypsy slave who has run away from his estate after having an affair with his wife.

name: Fantômas se déchaîne
summary_text: When Professor Marchand, a famous scientist, mysteriously disappears, the commissioner, Juve, immediately suspects Fantomas.

name: Fierce People
summary_text: A massage therapist looking to overcome her addictions and reconnect with her son, whose father is an anthropologist in South America studying the Yanomani people, moves in with a wealthy ex-client in New Jersey.

name: Hell Night
summary_text: Four college pledges are forced to spend the night in a deserted old mansion, where they are stalked by the monstrous survivor of a family massacre years earlier.

name: Exit to Eden
summary_text: Elliot heads for the sexual fantasy island, Eden. He takes some photos of diamond smugglers. They and undercover cops want the photos and follow him to Eden.

name: Front of the Class
summary_text: Brad Cohen who, despite being challenged by Tourette's Syndrome at a very young age, defies all odds to become a gifted teacher.

name: Once Upon a Time in China III
summary_text: Master Wong and his disciples enroll in the 'Dancing Lion Competition' to stop an assassination plot and to battle an arrogant, deceitful opponent.

name: Shams Al-Ma'arif
summary_text: In 2010, high school senior Husam, his best friend Maan, their one-time foe Ibrahim, and their teacher Orabi set out to produce a no-budget horror movie.

name: Boychoir
summary_text: After his single mother dies, a young boy with an excellent voice is sent to a prestigious choir school and has trouble adapting to the culture of the school.

name: While She Was Out
summary_text: A woman out late for Christmas Eve shopping is soon terrorized by a small gang of troublemakers, and she must fight for her life.

name: Black Cat
summary_text: Two women are raped and killed by samurai soldiers. Soon they reappear as vengeful ghosts who seduce and brutally murder the passing samurai.

name: Secret Admirer
summary_text: An anonymous love letter left in Michael Ryan's locker on the last day of school wreaks havoc on his life and the lives of everyone who come in contact with it.

name: Little Women
summary_text: A chronicle of the lives of a group of sisters growing up in nineteenth-century America.

name: Superintelligence
summary_text: When an all-powerful Superintelligence chooses to study average Carol Peters, the fate of the world hangs in the balance. As the A.I. decides to enslave, save or destroy humanity, it's up to Carol to prove that people are worth saving.

name: Lung foo moon
summary_text: Three young martial arts masters emerge from the back streets of Hong Kong to help the powerless fight injustice.

name: Car Wash
summary_text: A comedic take on the daily life of car-wash employees, chronicling their hopes, fears, joys, dreams, and tribulations, and meeting some eccentric customers along the way.

name: An Adventure in Space and Time
summary_text: A dramatisation of the early years of Doctor Who (1963), with the story revolving around BBC executive Sydney Newman, novice producer Verity Lambert and actor William Hartnell.

name: Graves End
summary_text: When society turns their back on reformed felons, the town of Graves End welcomes them but when the ex-cons disappear, FBI agent Paul Rickman comes looking for them and discovers more than he expected.

name: Mortal
summary_text: Fantasy adventure origin story about a young man discovering he has God-like powers based on ancient Norwegian mythology.

name: Monpura
summary_text: A housemaid is killed by a local landlord's son. His servant takes the blame for the murder, to save the landlord's mentally ill son and is marooned in an island named Monpura. There the ...                See full summary »

name: Hum Tumhare Hain Sanam
summary_text: Gopal's blissful married life with Radha blemishes when Radha gets obsessed with the career of her friend, Suraj, who is a singer. Ripped apart by jealousy, Gopal deserts Radha.

name: Primal
summary_text: Frank's caught wildlife in the Brazilian jungle incl. a 400 lbs. white jaguar. He ships it on the same ship as an arrested assassin. The assassin breaks free and frees the animals.

name: Expelled
summary_text: Felix is a legendary prankster who gets expelled from his high school and, with the help of his friends, will stop at nothing to hide it from his parents.

name: Just Getting Started
summary_text: A two-hander action comedy in the vein of Midnight Run (1988), about an ex-F.B.I. Agent (Tommy Lee Jones) and an ex-mob lawyer in the Witness Protection Program (Morgan Freeman) having to put aside their petty rivalry on the golf course to fend off a mob hit.

name: I Saw the Light
summary_text: The story of the country-western singer Hank Williams, who in his brief life created one of the greatest bodies of work in American music. The film chronicles his rise to fame and its tragic effect on his health and personal life.

name: Sweetheart
summary_text: Jenn has washed ashore a small tropical island and it doesn't take her long to realize she's completely alone. She must spend her days not only surviving the elements, but must also fend off the malevolent force that comes out each night.

name: Madame
summary_text: A rich man's fortune cookie: "Tonight you'll meet someone special." He meets a maid, made aristocrat for the evening to avoid 13 at the dinner party in Paris. They spend the night together. while the hostess stalks them.

name: French Fried Vacation
summary_text: Holidaymakers arriving in a Club Med camp on the Ivory Coast are determined to forget their everyday problems and emotional disappointments. Games, competitions, outings, bathing and sunburn accompany a continual succession of casual affairs.

name: Kak ya provyol etim letom
summary_text: One place. One day. Two men. The place is a polar research station on an island in the Arctic Ocean, inhabited now only by Sergei and Pavel. One day when Sergei is out angling, Pavel picks up a radio message that he daren't communicate.

name: Perrier's Bounty
summary_text: A gangster named Perrier looks to exact his revenge on a trio of fugitives responsible for the accidental death of one of his cronies.

name: A Zed & Two Noughts
summary_text: Twin zoologists lose their wives in a car accident and become obsessed with decomposing animals.

name: Neverwas
summary_text: A psychiatrist searches for insight into the life of his father, who was an acclaimed children's author. But he is shocked when his journey leads him to believe that the fantasy-land his father wrote about might actually exist.

name: Storm Warning
summary_text: A yuppie couple lost in a thick, brush-filled marsh seek refuge at an isolated farmhouse only to discover they've jumped out of the frying pan into the fire.

name: TerrorVision
summary_text: A family's new satellite TV system starts receiving signals from another planet, and soon it becomes the passageway to an alien world.

name: Friendly Persuasion
summary_text: The pacifist attitude of a Quaker family is tested as a result of the American Civil War.

name: Half Girlfriend
summary_text: Madhav meets a girl named Riya and falls in love. After stuggling to convince her to be his girlfriend, she half heartedly agrees to be his "Half Girlfriend"

name: Livide
summary_text: The suggestion of a big treasure hidden somewhere inside Mrs Jessel's once renowned classical dance academy will become an irresistible lure to a fiendish trap for Lucie and her friends.

name: Howling II: ... Your Sister Is a Werewolf
summary_text: A man discovers that his sister was a werewolf, and helps an investigator track down a gang of the monsters through the United States and eastern Europe.

name: The Other Side of the Wind
summary_text: A Hollywood director emerges from semi-exile with plans to complete work on an innovative motion picture.

name: A Christmas Carol
summary_text: An elderly miser learns the error of his ways on Christmas Eve.

name: De Marathon
summary_text: After finding out that they have a tax debt of forty thousand euros, four very out-of-shape men working at a car shop start to train for a marathon in which they can win the money to pay the debt.

name: Penny Serenade
summary_text: A couple's big dreams give way to a life full of unexpected sadness and unexpected joy.

name: Jallikattu
summary_text: A portrait of a remote village where a buffalo escapes and causes a frenzy of ecstatic violence.

name: Rupture
summary_text: A single mom tries to break free from a mysterious organization that has abducted her.

name: Captive
summary_text: A single mother struggling with drug addiction is taken hostage in her own apartment by a man on the run who has broken out of jail and murdered the judge assigned to his case.

name: Timecode
summary_text: Four frames of simultaneous action that alternately follow a smitten lesbian lover as she obsesses over her partner's dalliances and the tense goings-on of a Hollywood film production company.

name: Gaav
summary_text: An old villager deeply in love with his cow goes to the capital for a while. While he's there, the cow dies and now the villagers are afraid of his possible reaction to it when he returns.

name: Continuum
summary_text: After the disappearance of a young scientist on a business trip, his son and wife struggle to cope, only to make a bizarre discovery years later - one that may bring him home.

name: K2
summary_text: A U.S. climbing team, funded by millionaire Clairborne is determined to conquer K2.

name: War and Peace
summary_text: The Russian aristocracy prepares for the French invasion on the eve of 1812.

name: Dream a Little Dream
summary_text: An accident puts the consciousness of an elderly dream researcher into the body of a bratty teenager. The problem? The kid prefers dreamworld limbo to real life.

name: All Nighter
summary_text: A workaholic father who attempts to visit his daughter during a layover in LA, only to discover that she's disappeared, is forced to team up with her awkward ex-boyfriend to find her over the course of one transformative night.

name: The Disappearance of Haruhi Suzumiya
summary_text: On Dec.16, 5 friends in SOS Brigade (high school club) plan an Xmas party. On Dec.18, Haruhi +1 are missing and Kyon's 2 other friends don't know about the club.

name: Macbeth
summary_text: Macbeth, the Thane of Glamis, receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland. Consumed by ambition and spurred to action by his wife, Macbeth murders his king and takes the throne for himself.

name: Maximum Conviction
summary_text: When former black ops operative Cross (Seagal) and his partner Manning (Austin) are assigned to decommission an old prison, they must oversee the arrival of two mysterious female prisoners....                See full summary »

name: Kandahar
summary_text: After an Afghanistan-born woman who lives in Canada receives a letter from her suicidal sister, she takes a perilous journey through Afghanistan to try to find her.

name: Sai yau gei: Sin leui kei yun
summary_text: The convoluted continuation of the adventures of the time-traveling, now-human Monkey King, who attempts to fulfill his divine destiny.

name: Game of Death
summary_text: Secret Ops agent Marcus is sent to Detroit to take out an arms dealer and the head of the hedge fund that is financing him. His CIA backup has other plans and turns on him and it's a fight to survive in a hospital.

name: Bunty Aur Babli
summary_text: A small town pair become the legendary Bunty and Babli as caper after caper they turn the world on its head. Till they meet a very upset cop.

name: Le Petit Soldat
summary_text: During the Algerian War, a man and woman from opposing sides fall in love with one another.

name: Drunk Parents
summary_text: Two drunk parents attempt to hide their ever increasing financial difficulties from their daughter and social circle through elaborate neighborhood schemes.

name: Autopsy
summary_text: A young woman tries to find her injured boyfriend in a bizzare and dangerous hospital.

name: Flight of the Intruder
summary_text: During the air war over Vietnam, a U.S. Navy A-6 Intruder bomber pilot schemes with a hardened veteran to make an unauthorized air strike on Hanoi.

name: Don't Look Back
summary_text: A psychodrama about a photographer whose pictures tell a different story to that of her perception.

name: Piercing
summary_text: A man kisses his wife and baby goodbye and seemingly heads away on business, with a plan to check into a hotel, call an escort service, and kill an unsuspecting prostitute.

name: Oscar and Lucinda
summary_text: In mid-1800s England, Oscar is a young Anglican priest, a misfit and an outcast, but with the soul of an angel. As a boy, even though from a strict Pentecostal family, he felt God told him ...                See full summary »

name: Lightning Jack
summary_text: Lightning Jack Kane is an Australian outlaw in the wild west. During a bungled bank robbery he picks up mute Ben Doyle as a hostage. The two become good friends, with Jack teaching Ben how ...                See full summary »

name: The Boy and the World
summary_text: A little boy goes on an adventurous quest in search of his father.

name: House of Tolerance
summary_text: At an elegant Parisian bordello at the dawn of the 20th century, exists a cloistered world of pleasure, pain, hope, rivalries, and most of all, slavery.

name: The Stupids
summary_text: An incredibly dull-witted family unknowingly stumble upon an illegal weapons deal while on the trail of their "stolen" garbage.

name: The Keeping Room
summary_text: Left without men in the dying days of the American Civil War, three women must fight to defend their home and themselves from two rogue soldiers who have broken off from the fast-approaching Union Army.

name: Dummy
summary_text: An ex-office worker becomes a ventriloquist, leading to a date with his unemployment counselor; but his quirky family and a gauche female friend may thwart his new career and love life.

name: Mission Kashmir
summary_text: A police officer adopts the son and sole survivor of a family he has massacred while pursuing a terrorist. After some time the foster son finds out what the stepfather did.

name: Ratter
summary_text: A young graduate student is tormented by a stalker who hacks into her electronic devices and monitors her every move.

When the orphaned Karl Koch and his friend David start breaking into government and military computers, an acquaintance senses that there is money in computer cracking - and travels to east Berlin to try to contact the KGB.

name: Patron Mutlu Son Istiyor
summary_text: Sinan is sent to Capadocia by his boss, Isfendiyar to write a screenplay. As he waits for inspiration, Sinan finds himself running first into Eylul, the daughter of Izzet, who owns the ...                See full summary »

name: The Secret Garden
summary_text: An orphaned girl discovers a magical garden hidden at her strict uncle's estate.

name: The Blood of Heroes
summary_text: In a future where most of mankind and technology is wiped out, six people travel from place to place playing a brutal form of football with a dog skull. They hope one day to play in the league in a city.

name: Andre
summary_text: The true story of how a seal named Andre befriended a little girl and her family, circa 1962.

name: Witchboard
summary_text: When his girlfriend becomes dangerously obsessed with a ghost she contacted using a ouija board, Jim reluctantly joins forces with her ex - his own estranged childhood best friend - to identify and exorcise the evil spirit.

name: Revolution
summary_text: A trapper and his young son get pulled into the American revolution early as unwilling participants and remain involved through to the end.

name: Sleepless
summary_text: An older, retired police detective and a young amateur sleuth team up to find a serial killer who's resumed a killing spree in Turin, Italy after a 17-year period.

name: The Humbling
summary_text: A stage actor who is slowly losing his mind engages in a relationship with a sexually confused younger woman.

name: Sidewalks of New York
summary_text: The interlocking lives and loves of six New Yorkers.

name: Liberty Heights
summary_text: Baltimore, Fall 1954: Schools implement the new integration law. Ben finds the "colored" girl in his class cute - upsetting his Jewish mom and granny. Ben talks to her while his brother looks for his WASP dream girl.

name: Eden Log
summary_text: A man wakes up deep inside a cave. Suffering amnesia, he has no recollection of how he came to be here or of what happened to the man whose body he finds beside him. Tailed by a mysterious ...                See full summary »

name: Dude
summary_text: A group of teenage girlfriends deal with their impending graduation from high school.

name: Musarañas
summary_text: 1950s Madrid: The agoraphobic Montse raised her now 18 y.o. kid sister. The upstairs neighbor falls down the stairs and breaks a leg. The crazy Montse takes him in.

name: The Heart Is Deceitful Above All Things
summary_text: Seven-year-old Jeremiah is pulled from his foster home and thrown into a troubled life on the road with his teenage mother, Sarah.

name: Repeaters
summary_text: Three twenty-somethings find themselves in an impossible time loop, where each day they awaken to the same terrifying day as the preceding one.

name: Mard Ko Dard Nahin Hota
summary_text: It is a story of a young boy Surya who has a rare condition of Congenital Insensitivity to pain meaning he can not feel pain, and he sets out to learn martial arts and hunt down muggers.

name: Blind Man's Bluff
summary_text: This movie is about the stern gangster customs of one of the Russian provincial cities in the mid-90s . And you could expect either a stupid game of blind man's buffets or a truly bloody showdown with the stacks of "bluffers".

name: Level 16
summary_text: In a highly regimented boarding school, a pair of students discover that things are not as they seem.

name: Jindabyne
summary_text: After four men on a fishing trip discover a dead body in the water, they choose to delay reporting it and continue fishing.

name: Zapped!
summary_text: A high school science nerd gains telekinetic powers after a laboratory accident and uses them for revenge upon bullies.

name: Zulu Dawn
summary_text: A dramatization of the Battle of Isandlwana, where the British Army met its match against the Zulu nation.

name: WolfCop
summary_text: As a series of strange and violent events begin to occur, an alcoholic policeman realizes that he has been turned into a werewolf as part of a larger plan.

name: L'affaire Farewell
summary_text: The French intelligence service alerts the U.S. about a Soviet spy operation during the height of the Cold War, which sets off an unfortunate chain of events.

name: Soldier's Girl
summary_text: The true story of the price a young soldier paid for falling in love with a transsexual night-club performer.

name: McHale's Navy
summary_text: A retired Navy officer returns to active duty, along with a group of misfit sailors, to battle his former nemesis.

name: Farinelli
summary_text: The story of castrato opera singer Carlo Broschi, who enthralled 18th century European audiences under his stage name Farinelli.

name: The River
summary_text: A farming family battles severe storms, a bank is threatening to repossess their farm, and there are other hard times in a battle to save and hold on to their farm.

name: De Tweeling
summary_text: Twin Sisters is an epic love story based on the Dutch bestseller by Tessa de Loo that has been read by more than 3.5 million readers in Holland and Germany.

name: Ek Main Aur Ekk Tu
summary_text: A few drinks too many leads an uptight architect and quick-witted hairstylist to marry in Las Vegas. Can a mistake lead to friendship and love?

name: Haven
summary_text: On Friday the 13th, different people meet on Grand Cayman - a US money launderer and his daughter, a lawyer, a young fisherman in love with a rich man's daughter, other high school students, a crime gang etc.

name: The Devil's Tomb
summary_text: An elite group of soldiers on a covert mission to retrieve a scientist from an underground lab encounter an ancient evil in the facility.

name: Te doy mis ojos
summary_text: One winter night, Pilar runs away from home. With her, she takes only a few belongings and her son, Juan. Antonio soon sets out to look for her. He says Pilar is his sunshine, and what's more, "She gave him her eyes"...

name: Hell Is for Heroes
summary_text: Small squad must hold off German attack.

name: Hei kek ji wong
summary_text: A bar girl hires a struggling actor to give her acting lessons so that she can feign a greater interest in her customers. The longer they work together, the more they find they have in common.

name: Trilogy of Terror
summary_text: Three bizarre horror stories all of which star Karen Black in four different roles playing tormented women.

name: The Good Doctor
summary_text: A young doctor goes to unconscionable extremes in order to remain in the service of a female patient with a kidney disorder.

name: Monkey Trouble
summary_text: A young girl's life turns hairy when her new pet monkey turns out to be a trained pickpocket on the run from a scheming Gypsy.

name: Flood
summary_text: When a raging storm coincides with high seas it unleashes a colossal tidal surge, which travels mercilessly down England's East Coast and into the Thames Estuary. It is not a question of if, but when London floods.

name: I.D.
summary_text: When a cop goes undercover to infiltrate a gang of hooligans, he finds himself being drawn to the other side.

name: Klip
summary_text: In the face of her family life falling to pieces, a social media-obsessed teenage girl falls into a hedonistic world of sex, drugs and abuse.

name: The Blue Max
summary_text: A young pilot in the German air force of 1918, disliked as lower-class and unchivalrous, tries ambitiously to earn the medal offered for 20 kills.

name: Billa
summary_text: A cop chases international gangster Billa and happens to be the only one to see him die. He places Velu, Billa's lookalike, inside the gang to get information. But Velu is framed for killing the cop.

name: Airborne
summary_text: Mitchell Goosen is sixteen/seventeen-year-old kid from California who loves to surf and roller blade. Yet his parents, who are two zoologists, were given a grant to work in Australia. The ...                See full summary »

name: Bill Burr: Walk Your Way Out
summary_text: Comedian Bill Burr takes the stage in Nashville and riffs on such topics as overpopulation, fast food, dictators and gorilla sign language.
A real life documentary following the events of September 11 from an insider's view, through the lens of James Hanlon and two French filmmakers who were in Manhattan that one day.

name: On Dangerous Ground
summary_text: Rough city cop Jim Wilson is disciplined by his captain and is sent upstate, to a snowy mountain town, to help the local sheriff solve a murder case.

name: The Star Chamber
summary_text: Frustrated with a legal system gone haywire, a secret society of judges hires hitmen to snuff out criminals who escape courtroom justice - but one young judge questions the ethics of their vigilante system.

name: Trauma
summary_text: A young man tries to help a teenage European girl who escaped from a clinic hospital after witnessing the murder of her parents by a serial killer and they try to find the killer before the killer finds them.

name: The Sucker
summary_text: Criminals have chosen an ordinary man to carry drugs and jewels in his car across the border. The problem is that this man turned out too much ordinary.

name: Hunt to Kill
summary_text: Steve Austin stars as U.S. Border Patrol agent Jim Rhodes, a tough divorce mourning the loss of his murdered partner while struggling to raise his rebellious daughter in the mountains of ...                See full summary »

name: The Crocodile Hunter: Collision Course
summary_text: The Crocodile Hunter mistakes some CIA agents for poachers and sets out to stop them from capturing a wily croc which, unbeknownst to him, has swallowed a tracking drone.

name: Kireedam
summary_text: The life of a young man turns upside down when he intervenes in a dispute in order to rescue his father (a cop) from a ruthless local outlaw.

name: Ikimizin Yerine
summary_text: Çiçek is a girl who grew up in a small village. She has so many questions about her own life with no answers. And then her life is changed by Dogan, her literature teacher.

name: Arabesque
summary_text: Story of international intrigue involving a university professor, an Arab prime minister, a ruthless businessman, a beautiful spy, and hieroglyphics.

name: Khiladi 786
summary_text: A father who runs a marriage bureau believes that his son is a failure in life. In order to prove him wrong, his son takes on the task of finding a match for a gangster's sister.

name: Starcrash
summary_text: An outlaw smuggler and her alien companion are recruited by the Emperor of the Galaxy to rescue his son and destroy a secret weapon by the evil Count Zarth Arn.

name: Sun Alley
summary_text: A group of kids grow up on the short, wrong (east) side of the Sonnenallee in Berlin, right next to one of the few border crossings between East and West reserved for German citizens. The ...                See full summary »

name: The Foreigner
summary_text: A freelance agent must transport a package for a mysterious employer, leading him into a web of betrayal and deceit.

name: Silent Night, Deadly Night Part 2
summary_text: The now-adult Ricky talks to a psychiatrist about how he became a murderer after his brother, Billy, died, which leads back to Mother Superior.

name: I Shot Andy Warhol
summary_text: This is the story of Valerie Solanas who was a 60s radical preaching hatred toward men in her "Scum" manifesto. She wrote a screenplay for a film that she wanted Andy Warhol to produce. After many times of ignoring her, Valerie shot him.

name: The Infidel
summary_text: An identity crisis comedy centred on Mahmud Nasir, successful business owner, and salt of the earth East End Muslim who discovers that he's adopted - and Jewish.

name: Montage
summary_text: 15 years ago, a mother lost her child in a kidnapping case. A similar crime happens again and she won't let him go this time.

name: Mune: Guardian of the Moon
summary_text: When an evil magma demon and his minions steals the sun of a magical world, the new guardians of both the sun and the moon must embark on a quest to retrieve it and save their world from disaster as the moon faces destruction as well.

name: Never Talk to Strangers
summary_text: Sarah Taylor, a criminal psychologist, embarks on a torrid affair with a seductive stranger. However, she begins doubting whether she can trust him when a mysterious stalker begins harassing her.

name: Deep Throat
summary_text: A woman with an unusual birth defect comes to a doctor who has an unorthodox solution to make the best of her situation.

name: Made in Britain
summary_text: After being sent to a detention center, a teenage skinhead clashes with the social workers, who want to conform him to the status quo.

name: All the Way Boys
summary_text: A bush-flying duo crash-land in the heart of the Peruvian jungle where an unscrupulous speculator controls a precious emerald source and an entire mining community. Can they right the wrongs, and in the process, manage to make a profit?

name: The Sun Is also a Star
summary_text: A hopeless romantic ambivalent about his future in medical school falls for a hard-luck young woman who doesn't believe in love.

name: Two Can Play That Game
summary_text: An arrogant career woman plays a series of heartless mind-games with her boyfriend to "put him in line," only to discover that he has a few tricks up his own sleeve.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Cooler's Revenge
summary_text: After destroying Frieza on Namek, Goku returns to a peaceful life on Earth. When informed his brother has been killed by a Saiyan, Cooler is hell bent on killing Goku, and making him pay ...                See full summary »

name: Steam: The Turkish Bath
summary_text: Francesco inherits an old palace from a Turkish aunt and moves to Istanbul to renovate it.

name: Punishment Park
summary_text: "Punishment Park" is a pseudo-documentary purporting to be a film crews's news coverage of the team of soldiers escorting a group of hippies, draft dodgers, and anti-establishment types ...                See full summary »

name: Jimi: All Is by My Side
summary_text: A drama based on Jimi Hendrix's life as he left New York City for London, where his career took off.

name: Karakomik Filmler: Deli
summary_text: In the first part of Karakomik Filmler's sequel, Deli (Crazy) is about a taxi driver who's biggest wish is to sit across his loved one one day to get lost in her eyes. Trouble finds him while he's out working the night shift.

name: Cops and Robbersons
summary_text: A counterfeiter with a habit of "eliminating" the competition moves in next door to the Robbersons. Two cops move in with the Robbersons for a stakeout.

name: The Players Club
summary_text: A woman must contend with rival strippers and her boss in an attempt to make a legitimate living.

name: Namuslu
summary_text: When an incorruptible government pay clerk, who isn't taken seriously by anyone including his family, get robbed while carrying huge amount of work money, he becomes popular because people believe he faked the robbery and kept the money.

name: Yedi Bela Hüsnü
summary_text: Hüsnü, who is in love Hüsnüye, seeks help from his friend, Cemal, to get with Hüsnüye but Cemal keeps scamming Hüsnü to get his money. Cemal hears from the people on the streets that a ...                See full summary »

name: The Minus Man

name: Animal
summary_text: When plans for a weekend vacation hit a dead end, a group of close-knit friends find themselves stranded in unfamiliar territory, pursued by a menacing, blood thirsty predator.

name: Rhapsody in August
summary_text: Three generations' responses to the atomic bombing of Nagasaki.

name: Évolution
summary_text: The only residents of young Nicholas' sea-side town are women and boys. When he sees a corpse in the ocean one day, he begins to question his existence and surroundings. Why must he, and all the other boys, be hospitalised?

name: Stanley Ka Dabba
summary_text: A school-teacher, who forces children to share their food with him, forbids one from entering the school until he brings his own Tiffin/Lunch-box.

name: Lake Placid 2
summary_text: Man-eating crocodiles return to the lake, as two males and one aggressive female crocodile protecting their nest, wreak havoc on the locals.

name: Sicilian Vampire
summary_text: Equal parts Goodfellas (1990) and From Dusk Till Dawn (1996). Reputed mobster Sonny Trafficante was hoping to get away to the family hunting lodge for a little rest and relaxation and create some memories. Instead, what he got was a night he will never forget.

name: Beautiful Boy
summary_text: A married couple on the verge of separation are leveled by the news their 18-year-old son committed a mass shooting at his college, then took his own life.

name: Dark Habits
summary_text: A nightclub singer seeks refuge with gay nuns on dope in a Madrid convent.

name: American Son
summary_text: An estranged couple reunite in a Florida police station to help find their missing teenage son.

name: Hideaway
summary_text: Hatch gets a special resuscitative medicine after "dying" in a car accident. His wife and daughter only get minor injuries. He gets strange nightmares such as killing a teen girl. Is it just dreams?

name: Dirty Mary Crazy Larry
summary_text: Down-on-their-luck racers Larry and Deke steal from a supermarket manager to buy a car that will help them advance their racing chances. Their escape does not go as planned when Larry's one-night stand, Mary, tags along for the ride.

name: Hamoun

name: Baby Face
summary_text: A young woman, sexually exploited all her life, decides to turn the tables and exploit the hapless men at a big city bank - by gleefully sleeping her way to the top.

name: Mambo Italiano
summary_text: The son of Italian immigrants to Canada struggles to find the best way to reveal to his parents that he's gay.

name: Bogowie
summary_text: The early career of cardiac surgeon Zbigniew Religa. Despite harsh reality of the 1980s Poland, he successfully leads a team of doctors to the country's first human heart transplantation.

name: Juwanna Mann
summary_text: A basketball star is booted out of the NBA when his on-court antics go too far, so he poses as a woman and joins the WUBA.

name: To vlemma tou Odyssea
summary_text: An exiled filmmaker finally returns to his home country where former mysteries and afflictions of his early life come back to haunt him once more.

name: Cien años de perdón
summary_text: A bank. A safe box. An information that would shake a country.

name: Burn Notice: The Fall of Sam Axe
summary_text: Follows Sam Axe on a mission in Latin America and gives us a glimpse into his military past.

name: Badmaa$h Company
summary_text: Four youngsters grow rich together with a big idea in 90's middle-class Bombay. All is hunky dory till they are forced to shut shop until a plan comes up.

name: Satanic
summary_text: Four friends on their way to Coachella stop off in Los Angeles to tour true-crime occult sites, only to encounter a mysterious young runaway who puts them on a terrifying path to ultimate horror.

name: Son Osmanli Yandim Ali
summary_text: Story about an ottoman WWI veteran, who resistances against the occupiers.

name: Angus
summary_text: A miserable fat teenager secretly has a crush on the class beauty, ends up becoming the surprising participant to dance with her at a high school dance, meaning he's got to get his act together with the help of his best friend.

name: La Chinoise
summary_text: A small group of French students are studying Mao, trying to find out their position in the world and how to change the world to a Maoistic community using terrorism.

name: SuperFly
summary_text: With retirement on his mind, a successful Atlanta-based drug dealer sets up one last big job while dealing with trigger-happy colleagues and the police.

name: Metalhead

summary_text: When a capable dancer is provoked by the evil design of his employer, naturally he will be out to prove his mettle.

name: Perfect Sisters
summary_text: Tired of their mother's alcoholism and a string of her abusive boyfriends, two sisters plot to kill her.

name: Uncertainty
summary_text: A young couple, in love and facing a life-changing decision, find one seemingly ordinary July 4th cleaved in two by the flip of a coin on the Brooklyn Bridge.

name: The Caveman's Valentine
summary_text: A cave-dwelling man sets out to track down the killer of a homeless boy, and bring him to justice.

name: The Believers
summary_text: A New York psychiatrist finds that a brujería-inspired cult, which believes in child sacrifice, has a keen interest in his own son.

name: The Gruffalo
summary_text: A cunning mouse goes for a walk in the forest, and outwits a succession of predators.

name: VFW
summary_text: A group of old war veterans put their lives on the line to defend a young woman taking shelter in their local VFW post, who's running from a deranged drug dealer and his relentless army of drug addled punks.

summary_text: A young man, broke and jobless, abducts three rich college kids to try and get money from their fathers.

summary_text: A practitioner of the deadly martial art "Hokuto Shinken" allies with two children and an expert in "Nanto Suicho-Ken" to fight against the rivals who kidnapped his lover and threaten the prosperity of mankind.

summary_text: A frustrated city girl disguises herself as a youngster in order to get a cheaper train ticket home. But little "Sue Sue" finds herself in a whole heap of grown-up trouble when she hides out in a compartment with a handsome Major.

name: Sister
summary_text: A drama set at a Swiss ski resort and centered on a boy who supports his sister by stealing from wealthy guests.

name: Attenberg
summary_text: Stuck in her boring factory town, twenty-three-year-old Marina is at the mercy of both her father's impending death and her distaste for other humans.

summary_text: In 2024 a pandemic ravages the world and its cities. Centering on a handful of people as they navigate the obstacles currently hindering society: disease, martial law, quarantine, and vigilantes.

name: Color Me Kubrick
summary_text: The true story of a man who posed as director Stanley Kubrick during the production of Kubrick's last film, Eyes Wide Shut (1999), despite knowing very little about his work and looking nothing like him.

name: Chuen zik saat sau
summary_text: Two very different hitmen find themselves to be in each other's way. They use all their skill to solve the problem.

name: Veronika Voss
summary_text: Partially based on the life of Sybille Schmitz, who found fame under the Nazi regime, but whose career was destroyed afterward. Veronika Voss is a once prominent UFA actress, kept by her doctor, who raises suspicion in a sports journalist.

name: The War Game
summary_text: A docudrama depicting a hypothetical nuclear attack on Britain.

name: Anjaana Anjaani
summary_text: After numerous attempts at suicide fail, a couple decide to live it up and then kill themselves on New Year's Day.

name: Titanic
summary_text: An unhappily married couple struggle to deal with their problems while on board the ill-fated ship.

name: Eksi Elmalar

name: Shootout at Wadala
summary_text: The first-ever registered encounter by the Mumbai Police, which took place on November 1, 1982. Based on a true story.

name: Game Over
summary_text: A nyctophobic woman has to fight her inner demons to stay alive in the game called life.

name: Air Doll
summary_text: A life-size blow-up doll develops a soul and falls in love with a video store clerk.

name: Hideous Kinky
summary_text: Unsatisfied with her life in England, young mother Julia relocates to Morocco with her small daughters, Lucy and Bea. Although the family enjoys various adventures, they struggle to make ends meet.

name: Mr. Klein
summary_text: In Nazi-occupied Paris, the immoral art dealer, Robert Klein, leads a life of luxury, until a copy of a Jewish newspaper brings him to the attention of the police, linking him with a mysterious doppelgänger. Will Mr Klein clear his name?

summary_text: The master sleuth hunts his archenemy, Professor Moriarty, who is planning the crime of the century.

name: Asylum
summary_text: In order to secure a job at a mental institution, a young psychiatrist must interview four patients inside the asylum.

name: The Climb
summary_text: A young man from the suburbs with no mountaineering experience decides to climb Mt Everest to show a woman he'd do anything for her.

name: Seberg
summary_text: Inspired by real events in the life of French New Wave icon Jean Seberg. In the late 1960s, Hoover's FBI targeted her because of her political and romantic involvement with civil rights activist Hakim Jamal.

summary_text: Desmond's wife leaves him and their 3 kids after Christmas 1953. Unemployed in Dublin, the authorities place the kids in orphanages. Employed again, Desmond tries to get his kids back.

summary_text: A simple man from a village falls in love with his new neighbor. He enlists the help of his musical-theater friends to woo the lovely girl-next-door away from her music teacher.

name: Series 7: The Contenders
summary_text: A TV program selects people at random to kill one another for fame and their freedom.

name: Lemon Tree
summary_text: The story of a Palestinian widow who must defend her lemontree field when a new Israeli Defense Minister moves next to her and threatens to have her lemon grove torn down.

name: X: The Man with the X-Ray Eyes
summary_text: A doctor uses special eye drops to give himself x-ray vision, but the new power has disastrous consequences.

name: Madhouse
summary_text: A young psychiatric intern unearths secrets about the mental health facility in which he works.

name: After the Wedding
summary_text: A manager of an orphanage in Kolkata travels to New York to meet a benefactor.

name: The Winning Season
summary_text: A comedy centered on a has-been coach who is given a shot at redemption when he's asked to run his local high school's girls basketball team.

name: Homicide
summary_text: A Jewish homicide detective investigates a seemingly minor murder and falls in with a Zionist group as a result.

name: Ariel
summary_text: A Finnish man goes to the city to find a job after the mine where he worked is closed and his father commits suicide.

name: The Wind
summary_text: A plains-woman faces the harshness and isolation of the untamed land in the Western frontier of the late 1800s.

name: The Dancer Upstairs
summary_text: A police detective in a South American country is dedicated to hunting down a revolutionary guerilla leader.

name: The Brain That Wouldn't Die
summary_text: A doctor experimenting with transplant techniques keeps his girlfriend's head alive when she is decapitated in a car crash, then goes hunting for a new body.

name: The City of the Dead
summary_text: A young college student arrives in a sleepy Massachusetts town to research witchcraft; during her stay at an eerie inn, she discovers a startling secret about the town and its inhabitants.

summary_text: A divorced father and his eight-year-old son are about to spend a somewhat predictable weekend together, nevertheless, when a valuable toolbox gets stolen, the search for the thieves will soon turn into a true family bonding.
